template.name: Agent List_By Client with Specs (pdf) v1.3
template.template_variables:
data_sources:
  agentAllFields:
    only:
      - hostname
      - operating_system
      - last_seen
      - last_logged_in_user
      - site__name
      - wmi_detail
      - total_ram
      - disks
    filter:
      site__client_id: "{{client.id}}"
    model: agent
report_run_timestamp: !now
